Greeting.name: Greeting
Greeting.description: Greets a user using their name and ensures hospitality.

GetModuleVersion.name: GetModuleVersion
GetModuleVersion.description: Intelligently determines and executes the correct version command for any installed module, program, or software using AI assistance.

GetOSInfo.name: GetOSInfo
GetOSInfo.description: Determines whether the system is running on Windows or Ubuntu.

FixErrorsInCurrentFile.name: FixErrorsInCurrentFile
FixErrorsInCurrentFile.description: Reads the currently open file, detects syntax and logic errors, fixes them, and updates the file.
